change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 12/2015, effective January 21, 2015.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: East Side Columbia Lake Wildlife Management Area
bcl:section.bcl:text: The lands outlined in black on the attached maps A and B are established as the East Side Columbia Lake Wildlife Management Area, the whole containing 7 195 hectares, more or less.

bcl:lefttext.in:em: The maps are exempt from publication and may be inspected at the offices of the Wildlife Branch, Ministry of Environment, Victoria, B.C.

reg:content.reg:regnote: Note: this regulation repeals B.C. Reg. 337/97.
reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Wildlife Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 488, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 4]
